definition: bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: The dimples of encouragement are good for me and you.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵的笑靨於你我大有裨益。

sentences.english: From a financial stand-point alone, safety pays off.
sentences.chinese: 單從經濟角度來看，安全生產也是大有裨益的。

sentences.english: This layer is the layer where static type safety will really help.
sentences.chinese: 所以，靜態類型安全在這一層中將會大有裨益。

sentences.english: Another technique that works well with holistic learning is retracing.
sentences.chinese: 另一個對全面學習大有裨益的就是追溯或複習。

sentences.english: Such recommendations will weigh in his favour.
sentences.chinese: 這種推薦對望大有裨益。

sentences.english: And for Cao Yinghui, and Palmer nice cooperation will be of great advantage.
sentences.chinese: 而對曹穎惠來說，與艾康尼斯的合作也大有裨益。

sentences.english: A crash course in color theory will go a long way.
sentences.chinese: 在色彩理論上個速成班對你大有裨益。

sentences.english: Adding chopped avocados to salads or sliced ones to sandwiches will go a long way.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉或三明治中加入些鱷梨會對你的身體大有裨益。

sentences.english: Hu apparently felt it was worth having Apple talk Lark up at these conferences.
sentences.chinese: 胡顯然認爲蘋果在會議上討論Lark是大有裨益的。

sentences.english: However, there is some research that suggests that a playful approach to fighting can be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一些研究卻表明，玩格鬥遊戲對孩子大有裨益。

sentences.english: The implementation of house property hypothecation is beneficial to the realization of promoting these goals.
sentences.chinese: 房產抵押權的實現對促進這一目標的實現，大有裨益。

sentences.english: Laughter is great for you – body and soul.
sentences.chinese: 笑聲對你的身體和靈魂都大有裨益。

sentences.english: Over a third (36.7 per cent) of people claimed that eating breakfast gives them more energy.
sentences.chinese: 很多證據表明喫早餐對人的身體大有裨益。

sentences.english: There are enormous internal, personal benefits to diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 診斷對個人其實是大有裨益的。

sentences.english: This kind interact obscurely to live to have profit greatly to harmonious husband and wife.
sentences.chinese: 這種隱晦的互動對於和諧的夫妻生活大有裨益。

definition: harmful and without benefit (idiom); more harm than good
to promote/to enhance/to further/to advance (a cause etc)

pinyin: you3 bai3 hai4 er2 wu2 yi1 li4

definition: to be beneficial/to be good for
half the work, twice the effect (idiom); the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
